A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Normally I would give garbage like this one star... But to be fair.. even though this film did just about everything wrong that it could have... at least I was mildly entertained throughout.

Everything else however\, was a massive fail. Failed at telling a story. Failed at introducing interesting characters. Failed at Luke's character\, failed at making this movie consistent with the last. Fail fail fail. 

I always refused to own The Phantom Menace... Until I watched this garbage. It's that bad I went out and bought the 6 movie saga box set knowing that as of now that is the only real Star Wars left.
